properties.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon/Salmon River Region; Orofino/Grangeville Region
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 9 at 1:05PM MST until January 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Blowing snow possible near
Grangeville. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches
possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph near Grangeville.

* WHERE...Camas Prairie, Grangeville and vicinity, Greer Grade,
Highway 95 Slate Creek to Riggins, and White Bird Grade.

* WHEN...From Friday afternoon through late Friday night.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT
